def_cn: 无拘无束的;自由自在的;不受约束的
def_en: If you describe someone as footloose, you mean that they have no responsibilities or commitments, and are therefore free to do what they want and go where they want.

def_cn: (单身的人)无拘无束的，自由自在的
def_en: If you describe someone as footloose and fancy-free, you mean that they are not married or in a similar relationship, and you therefore consider them to have very few responsibilities or commitments.
